metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0127 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The time-validation implementation in (1) mod/feedback/complete.php and (2)mod/feedback/complete_guest.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before2.4.9, 2.5.x before 2.5.5, and 2.6.x before 2.6.2 allows remoteauthenticated users to bypass intended restrictions on starting a Feedbackactivity by choosing an unavailable time.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0127` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.5').
